languages.text: {n}Сжав губы, Ирлиэт кивает.{/n} "Делай свое дело, вор плоти. Я не страшусь тебя, я не страшусь боли". {n}Ее губы повторяют эти слова, словно мантру, когда гемункул ударом загоняет иглу в ее грудь. Изнутри ее тела раздается щелчок, и побелевшее лицо Ирлиэт искажает страдание... но она остается неподвижна, словно статуя.{/n}

{n}Yrliet presses her lips together and nods.{/n} "Do your work, flesh-stealer. I do not fear you, nor do I fear pain." {n}She goes on to mouth these words over and over like a mantra when the Haemonculus drives the needle into her chest. A click comes from inside her body. Yrliet pales, her face twisted in torment... but she remains as still as a statue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сжав губы, Ирлиэт кивает.{/n} "Делай свое дело, вор плоти. Я не страшусь тебя, я не страшусь боли". {n}Ее губы повторяют эти слова, словно мантру, когда гемункул ударом загоняет иглу в ее грудь. Изнутри ее тела раздается щелчок, и побелевшее лицо Ирлиэт искажает страдание... но она остается неподвижна, словно статуя.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは唇を引き締めて頷く。{/n}「やればいい、肉体を奪う者よ。私はお前も、痛みも恐れはしない」{n}ハモンキュラスが彼女の胸に針を突き刺そうとする瞬間、彼女はこの言葉を呪言のように何度も口にした。カチっという音が彼女の身体の内側より聞こえる。ユリエットは青ざめ、苦痛に顔を歪めながらも、彫像のようにじっとしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips together and nods.{/n} "Do your work, flesh-stealer. I do not fear you, nor do I fear pain." {n}She goes on to mouth these words over and over like a mantra when the Haemonculus drives the needle into her chest. A click comes from inside her body. Yrliet pales, her face twisted in torment... but she remains as still as a statue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは唇を引き締めて頷く。{/n}「やればいい、肉体を奪う者よ。私はお前も、痛みも恐れはしない」{n}ハモンキュラスが彼女の胸に針を突き刺そうとする瞬間、彼女はこの言葉を呪言のように何度も口にした。カチっという音が彼女の身体の内側より聞こえる。ユリエットは青ざめ、苦痛に顔を歪めながらも、彫像のようにじっとしていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特抿紧嘴唇，点了点头。{/n}“动手吧，盗窃血肉的家伙。我不惧怕你，也不惧怕痛苦。”{n}她一遍一遍地重复着这些话，就像念咒语一样。血伶人将尖针刺入了她的胸膛，她的体内传来了“咔哒”一声。伊莉耶特脸色苍白，脸在痛苦之中扭曲着……但她仍然像雕像一样一动不动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips together and nods.{/n} "Do your work, flesh-stealer. I do not fear you, nor do I fear pain." {n}She goes on to mouth these words over and over like a mantra when the Haemonculus drives the needle into her chest. A click comes from inside her body. Yrliet pales, her face twisted in torment... but she remains as still as a statue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特抿紧嘴唇，点了点头。{/n}“动手吧，盗窃血肉的家伙。我不惧怕你，也不惧怕痛苦。”{n}她一遍一遍地重复着这些话，就像念咒语一样。血伶人将尖针刺入了她的胸膛，她的体内传来了“咔哒”一声。伊莉耶特脸色苍白，脸在痛苦之中扭曲着……但她仍然像雕像一样一动不动。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet pince les lèvres et hoche la tête.{/n} « Faites ce que vous avez à faire, voleur de chair. Je ne vous crains pas, pas plus que je ne crains la douleur. » {n}Elle répète ces mots comme un mantra lorsque l'hémoncule plonge l'aiguille dans sa poitrine. Un cliquetis résonne dans son corps. Yrliet pâlit, le visage tordu de douleur... mais elle ne bouge pas d'un cil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips together and nods.{/n} "Do your work, flesh-stealer. I do not fear you, nor do I fear pain." {n}She goes on to mouth these words over and over like a mantra when the Haemonculus drives the needle into her chest. A click comes from inside her body. Yrliet pales, her face twisted in torment... but she remains as still as a statue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet pince les lèvres et hoche la tête.{/n} « Faites ce que vous avez à faire, voleur de chair. Je ne vous crains pas, pas plus que je ne crains la douleur. » {n}Elle répète ces mots comme un mantra lorsque l'hémoncule plonge l'aiguille dans sa poitrine. Un cliquetis résonne dans son corps. Yrliet pâlit, le visage tordu de douleur... mais elle ne bouge pas d'un cil.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet aprieta los labios y asiente.{/n} «Haz tu trabajo, ladrón de carne. No te temo, ni temo el dolor». {n}Repite estas palabras sin hablar una y otra vez, como si fuera un mantra, mientras el Hemónculo clava la aguja en su pecho. Se oye un chasquido. Yrliet palidece, con rostro torturado... pero permanece inmóvil como una estatua.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips together and nods.{/n} "Do your work, flesh-stealer. I do not fear you, nor do I fear pain." {n}She goes on to mouth these words over and over like a mantra when the Haemonculus drives the needle into her chest. A click comes from inside her body. Yrliet pales, her face twisted in torment... but she remains as still as a statue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet aprieta los labios y asiente.{/n} «Haz tu trabajo, ladrón de carne. No te temo, ni temo el dolor». {n}Repite estas palabras sin hablar una y otra vez, como si fuera un mantra, mientras el Hemónculo clava la aguja en su pecho. Se oye un chasquido. Yrliet palidece, con rostro torturado... pero permanece inmóvil como una estatua.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet presst ihre Lippen aufeinander und nickt.{/n} "Vollbringt Euer Werk, Fleischräuber. Ich fürchte weder Euch noch den Schmerz." {n}Diese Worte wiederholt sie einem Mantra gleich immer und immer wieder, während ihr der Haemonculus die Nadel in die Brust bohrt. Aus dem Inneren ihres Körpers ertönt ein Klicken. Yrliet erblasst und verzieht gequält das Gesicht ... bleibt ansonsten aber reglos wie eine Statue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips together and nods.{/n} "Do your work, flesh-stealer. I do not fear you, nor do I fear pain." {n}She goes on to mouth these words over and over like a mantra when the Haemonculus drives the needle into her chest. A click comes from inside her body. Yrliet pales, her face twisted in torment... but she remains as still as a statue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet presst ihre Lippen aufeinander und nickt.{/n} "Vollbringt Euer Werk, Fleischräuber. Ich fürchte weder Euch noch den Schmerz." {n}Diese Worte wiederholt sie einem Mantra gleich immer und immer wieder, während ihr der Haemonculus die Nadel in die Brust bohrt. Aus dem Inneren ihres Körpers ertönt ein Klicken. Yrliet erblasst und verzieht gequält das Gesicht ... bleibt ansonsten aber reglos wie eine Statue.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, dudaklarını sımsıkı kapatıyor ve onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Yap yapacağını et hırsızı. Ne senden korkuyorum ne de acıdan." {n}Haimonkulus, iğneyi göğsüne sokarken bu sözleri bir düstur gibi tekrar tekrar dile getiriyor. Bedeninin içinden bir tıkırtı meydana geliyor. Yrliet'in rengi soluyor, yüzü acıyla çarpılıyor ancak heykel gibi hareketsiz kalmayı sürdürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet presses her lips together and nods.{/n} "Do your work, flesh-stealer. I do not fear you, nor do I fear pain." {n}She goes on to mouth these words over and over like a mantra when the Haemonculus drives the needle into her chest. A click comes from inside her body. Yrliet pales, her face twisted in torment... but she remains as still as a statue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet dudaklarını sımsıkı kapatıyor ve onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Yap yapacağını et hırsızı. Ne senden korkuyorum, ne de acıdan." {n}Haimonkulus iğneyi göğsüne sokarken, bu sözleri bir düstur gibi tekrar tekrar dile getiriyor. Bedeninin içinden bir tıkırtı geliyor. Yrliet'in rengi soluyor, yüzü acıyla çarpılıyor ancak heykel gibi hareketsiz kalmayı sürdürüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
